The class {{tt|local_t}} is a pseudo-clock that is used as the first template argument to {{lc|std::chrono::time_point}} to indicate that the time point represents local time with respect of a not-yet-specified time zone. {{tt|local_time}} supports streaming and the full set of time point arithmetic.
